mapper.select: SELECT NVL(b.class_now_participation,-1) as class_now_participation FROM class a, (select count(case when MEMBER_TYPE=#{member_type} then '1' end) as class_now_participation from member where MEMBER_SEQ in(SELECT INCLASS_MEMBER_SEQ FROM inclass WHERE inclass_class_seq = #{class_seq})) b WHERE a.seq = #{class_seq} and b.class_now_participation(+) >= a.class_participation
SELECT count(INCLASS_CLASS_SEQ) FROM inclass WHERE INCLASS_MEMBER_SEQ = #{member_seq} and INCLASS_CLASS_SEQ = #{class_seq}

SELECT a.class_name FROM (select CLASS_TYPE,CLASS_MEMBER_SEQ,CLASS_NAME,REGDATE,SEQ,CLASS_TERMIN,CLASS_PARTICIPATION,CLASS_SD,CLASS_DEPA,CLASS_STARTTIME,CLASS_WEEK, CLASS_CD,CLASS_TIME from class where class_type in('W','C') AND class_termin = 'N' and seq in(select inclass_class_seq from inclass where inclass_member_seq = #{member_seq} )) a, (select CLASS_TYPE,CLASS_MEMBER_SEQ,CLASS_NAME,REGDATE,SEQ,CLASS_TERMIN,CLASS_PARTICIPATION,CLASS_SD,CLASS_DEPA,CLASS_STARTTIME,CLASS_WEEK, CLASS_CD,CLASS_TIME from class where class_type in('W','C') AND class_termin = 'N' and seq = #{seq}) b WHERE a.CLASS_SD<=b.class_cd and (a.CLASS_CD>=b.class_sd) and (to_date(a.class_starttime, 'hh24mi') <= (to_date(b.class_starttime, 'hh24mi')+b.class_time/(24*60))) and ( to_date(a.class_starttime, 'hh24mi')+a.class_time/(24*60))>=(to_date(a.class_starttime, 'hh24mi')) and REGEXP_LIKE(a.CLASS_WEEK,b.class_week)

SELECT class_name FROM (select CLASS_TYPE,CLASS_MEMBER_SEQ,CLASS_NAME,REGDATE,SEQ,CLASS_TERMIN, CLASS_IMG,CLASS_DETAIL,CLASS_PARTICIPATION,CLASS_SD,CLASS_DEPA,CLASS_AREA,CLASS_STARTTIME,CLASS_WEEK, CLASS_CD,CLASS_HASHTAG,CLASS_PRICE,CLASS_TIME,CLASS_INFO from class where class_member_seq = #{class_member_seq} AND class_termin = 'N' ) WHERE CLASS_SD<=to_date(#{class_cd},'yyyy-mm-dd') and (CLASS_CD>=to_date(#{class_sd},'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (to_date(class_starttime, 'hh24mi') <= (to_date(#{class_starttime}, 'hh24mi')+#{class_time}/(24*60)) and ( to_date(class_starttime, 'hh24mi')+class_time/(24*60))>=(to_date(#{class_starttime}, 'hh24mi'))) and REGEXP_LIKE(CLASS_WEEK,#{class_week})

SELECT A.CLASS_TYPE,A.SEQ, A.CLASS_NAME,A.REGDATE, A.CLASS_INFO, A.CLASS_AREA, A.CLASS_DEPA , A.CLASS_SD , A.CLASS_CD, A.CLASS_WEEK , A.CLASS_STARTTIME , A.CLASS_TIME , A.CLASS_PRICE, A.CLASS_PARTICIPATION, A.CLASS_DETAIL, A.CLASS_IMG , A.CLASS_HASHTAG, A.CLASS_TERMIN, NVL(B.RATING,0) AS RATING, C.PARTICIPATION, C.D_DAY, D.MEMBER_NAME AS CLASS_CREATOR_NAME FROM (SELECT CLASS_TYPE, SEQ, CLASS_NAME, REGDATE, CLASS_INFO, CLASS_AREA, CLASS_DEPA , CLASS_SD , CLASS_CD, CLASS_WEEK , CLASS_STARTTIME , CLASS_TIME , CLASS_PRICE, CLASS_PARTICIPATION, CLASS_DETAIL, CLASS_IMG , CLASS_HASHTAG, CLASS_TERMIN,CLASS_MEMBER_SEQ FROM CLASS WHERE SEQ IN(SELECT INCLASS_CLASS_SEQ FROM INCLASS WHERE INCLASS_MEMBER_SEQ= #{member_seq})) A, (SELECT CLASS.CLASS_MEMBER_SEQ, ROUND(AVG(REVIEW.REVIEW_RATING),1) AS RATING FROM REVIEW, CLASS WHERE REVIEW.REVIEW_CLASS_SEQ = CLASS.SEQ GROUP BY CLASS.CLASS_MEMBER_SEQ) B, (SELECT SEQ, (SELECT COUNT(INCLASS.INCLASS_CLASS_SEQ) FROM INCLASS WHERE INCLASS.INCLASS_CLASS_SEQ = CLASS.SEQ) AS PARTICIPATION, (TO_CHAR(CLASS.CLASS_SD,'YYYYMMDD')-TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD')) AS D_DAY FROM CLASS) C, (SELECT MEMBER_SEQ,MEMBER_NAME FROM MEMBER) D WHERE A.CLASS_MEMBER_SEQ = B.CLASS_MEMBER_SEQ (+) AND A.SEQ = C.SEQ AND D.MEMBER_SEQ = A.CLASS_MEMBER_SEQ
SELECT INCLASS_CLASS_SEQ AS SEQ FROM INCLASS WHERE INCLASS_MEMBER_SEQ = #{memberSeq}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM inclass WHERE inclass_class_seq = #{seq} and inclass_member_seq = (SELECT member_seq FROM member WHERE member_email = #{email})
DELETE FROM class_wishlist WHERE wishlist_class_seq = #{seq} and wishlist_member_seq = (SELECT member_seq FROM member WHERE member_email = #{email})
mapper.update: UPDATE class SET class_termin = #{termin} where seq = #{seq}
